verification_code.description: Email verification code (received from a verify_email call, which must be done first).

client_password.description: Password (length within 6-25 chars, accepts any printable ASCII character).

utm_source.description: [Optional] Identifies the source of traffic such as: search engine, newsletter, or other referral.

utm_medium.description: [Optional] Identifies the medium the link was used upon such as: email, CPC, or other methods of sharing.

utm_campaign.description: [Optional] Identifies a specific product promotion or strategic campaign such as a spring sale or other promotions.

email_consent.description: [Optional] 1 or 0, indicating permission to use email address for any contact which may include marketing.

gclid_url.description: [Optional] Google Click Identifier to track source.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
